thread.section_title: Solar Quotes Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Solar Quotes | solarquotes.com.au
thread.title: john stanbridge
thread.title_full: Solar Quotes reviewed by john stanbridge

author: john stanbridge
title: john stanbridge
text:
The Solar Quote: s website is professional, user friendly and has heaps of good advice/education for the prospective solar purchaser.
Of the three Quote: s I received, two were very good and the third just posted a Quote: that was way off the mark, so that one dropped out immediately.
Both companies representatives visited us on site, were experienced solar professionals who explained the proposed solutions and the process, and took the time to ensure we understood both.
Both solutions were close in quality and cost, and we were happy that our final choice came down to a preference for a local company and our confidence in the designer.
